item.title: How to import built-in datasets in R
item.description: Overview R is a representative statistical programming language that not only provides useful methods but also offers data sets that are good as examples. Without such data sets, one would have to download and load new data every time when giving lectures. Guide The method to load a data set is very simple. All you need to do is assign the name of the data set you want to load
